    • Method Detail

      • getHomeCountry

        void getHomeCountry(ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnGetHomeCountryListener listener)
        Fetches the Persistently stored Home country, the value is taken from the variable which has been set by setHomeCountry API. Changing the country automatically clears the cached service list and triggers a refresh.
        Parameters:
        listener - country code to persistently store, code must be according to ISO 3166-1

      • setHomeCountry

        void setHomeCountry(java.lang.String countryCode)
        Persistently store Home country, overwrites any existing country value. Changing the country automatically clears the cached service list and triggers a refresh.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - country code to persistently store, code must be according to ISO 3166-1

      • getServiceUrlWithLanguagePreference

        void getServiceUrlWithLanguagePreference(java.lang.String serviceId,
                                       ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnGetServiceUrlListener listener)
        Returns the URL for a specific service with a preference for the current language.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - name of the service for which the URL is to be retrieved
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess the URL of the requested service; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.

      • getServicesWithLanguagePreference

        void getServicesWithLanguagePreference(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> serviceId,
                                     ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnGetServiceUrlMapListener listener)
        Returns Hashmap with URL mapped specific service with a preference for the current language.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - ArrayList of the service for which the URL is to be retrieved
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess the URL of the requested service; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.

      • getServiceUrlWithCountryPreference

        void getServiceUrlWithCountryPreference(java.lang.String serviceId,
                                      ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnGetServiceUrlListener listener)
        Returns the URL for a specific service with a preference for the current home country.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - name of the service for which the URL is to be retrieved
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess the URL of the requested service; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.

      • getServicesWithCountryPreference

        void getServicesWithCountryPreference(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> serviceId,
                                    ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnGetServiceUrlMapListener listener)
        Returns Hashmap with URL mapped for a specific service with a preference for the current home country.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - List of the services for which the URL is to be retrieved
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess the URL of the requested service; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.

      • getServiceLocaleWithLanguagePreference

        void getServiceLocaleWithLanguagePreference(java.lang.String serviceId,
                                          ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnGetServiceLocaleListener listener)
        Returns the locale to be used for a specific service with a preference for the current language.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - name of the service for which the URL is to be retrieved
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess the recommended locale for the requested service; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.

      • getServiceLocaleWithCountryPreference

        void getServiceLocaleWithCountryPreference(java.lang.String serviceId,
                                         ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnGetServiceLocaleListener listener)
        Returns the locale to be used for a specific service with a preference for the current home country.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - name of the service for which the URL is to be retrieved
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess the recommended locale for the requested service; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.

      • refresh

        void refresh(ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnRefreshListener listener)
        Start negotiation with cloud service for the list of service for this application. List is based on sector, microsite, home country, and language. The retrieved list is cached internally (not persistently). The cached list is automatically refreshed every 24hours. A refresh is only required, to ensure the very first service request after app start can be processed from the cache quickly, or when a previous sync failed.
        Parameters:
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess when retrieval was successful; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.
